title: IGOTPERMABANNEDOHMYGAWDUNBANMEPLEASE
body: IVE COME ON THE BOARDS TO ASK MY TOTALLY OK ACCOUNT TO GET UNPERMABANNED ALL I DID WAS SAY THE N WORD 64564375437i5i734 TIMES AND INT IN MY LANE UNTIL I DIED 56 BILLION TIMES, ITS ALMOST LIKE THIS REPORT SYSTEM IS TRASH BECAUSE I WAS TOXIC BUT GOT BANNED SO UNBAN ME BECAUSE I NEED LEAGUE OF LEGENDS IN MY LYFE OR I WILL COMMIT LEGO TO FOOT OMYGAWDRITOWHATRUDOINGUGUYSSUCK. REEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE.

Oh no, another "Im not toxic and no one deserves to be unbanned" thread. Getting sick of this honestly.

And who the fuck recently has requested an unban? Do you people just wake up one day and be like "Hey, today i'll post a popular opinion on boards so i can have some upvotes on the irrelevant game's forum !!! Mom's gonna be proud !"
/r/Woooooooooooooooooooooosh. It was making fun of all those people who post "unban me please" because they were toxic. I wasn't banned lol.

You're the one who got wooshed. I complained about your post, there's literally 1000000000000 posts like yours that blame toxic people for begging for an unban. It's just my hatred for out of nowhere "PSA: You're not getting unbanned" posts. 
We all already now that permabanned accs won't be unbanned. Yall dont have to open a upvote-grabbing threads.
Its meant to be a joke lol.
